message.body: Hey. How certain are you that you'll leave on Wednesday from Haverford? Because I think you should leave Thursday and come visit me on your way home! Are you driving people home for break?
I'm leaving Saturday and coming back here Thursday. I could come visit you on one end though
Gotcha. I misread your fb message.
But still you should stop by on your way home b/c I'll still be at amherst. But when you drive to school on the 14th, I'll be in class from all day until I leave, I only have a break from 11-1
If it works out for you to do that. Idk if it would.
So can I stay there Saturday night the 9th?
As long as you're cool with you know my crazy suite mates. Also, you'll probs need a sleeping bag/aero bed...
Sure!
Ok!
Excellent! I'm glad I'll get to see you! Before you GRADUATE and all.
Well you can also visit ME slash COME TO MY GRADUATION
also AAAAGGGHHH
also PENN OFFERED ME A JOB
YAY!!!! Congratulations!!
Thanks
Yes, I will def come to your grad with foghorns no less :P
I forget which the job the Penn one is, is it the one with the crazy boss?
Yep haha. I have a full day interview with two NIH labs on Wednesday and after that well see!
Well look at you all jobs this jobs that. It's like you're almost a COLLEGE GRAD. In the REAL world (but not like the TV show)
Though that's be a great show. REAL WORLD: Jobs Edition.
And you document people struggle to do job things and competing for jobs and shit.
Yeah...
Oh god
Haha the real reality TV.
Too real
